defaultViewDistance.name: Default Grid View Distance
defaultViewDistance.hint: Number of grid spaces to be displayed.

defaultViewShape.name: Default Grid View Shape
defaultViewShape.hint: The shape of the grid mask.

tacticalGridCombatOnly.name: Only show Tactical Grid while in combat
tacticalGridCombatOnly.hint: When enabled the tactical grid view will only be shown on the Token layer when combat is started.

enableForControlled.name: Grid Enable: Controlled
enableForControlled.hint: Grid will be shown for controlled tokens.

enableForHover.name: Grid Enable: Hover
enableForHover.hint: Grid will be shown for hovered over tokens.
